data.message: I am soooo done being cheated on in candy crush. you take my bars for extra moves, and then NOTHING !!!!!! Several  times I only had 1 jelly, and I get  NOTHING for my bars , and or Lollipops never worked  GOODBYE

replies.message: Thanks for stopping by, Ra'Nae. Apps and games are managed by developers outside of Facebook. If you need help with an app or game, contact the developer directly. Learn how at: http://on.fb.me/1GegvNJ. Hope this helps! -Sidney
